description:
Umibozu falls in love with a freelance reporter masquerading as a restaurant pianist so she can investigate a crooked politician.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganbare Umibouzu!! Hard na Hatsukoi Kyousoukyoku
Go For It, Umibozu! - One, Hard Boiled First Love Concerto
がんばれ海坊主!! ハードな初恋協奏曲
